sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
may happen or be true
, mislimo, da se je tisto mogoče zgodilo ali da je mogoče res.

seg.quote: We may be here a long time.
A gigantic meteorite may have wiped out the dinosaurs 65 million years ago.
They struggle to cure diseases so that people may live longer.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
may do something
, mu je dovoljeno, da tisto naredi.

seg.quote: If the verdict is unacceptable, the defendant may appeal.
May I have a word with you, please?

sense.def:
Besedo
may
uporabljamo tudi, kadar hočemo povedati, da je nekaj sicer res, a res je tudi nekaj nasprotnega.

seg.quote: They may be seven thousand miles away but they know what's going on over here.
Ingenious though these techniques may be, they can hardly be regarded as practical.

sense.def:
May
je peti mesec v letu.
